snippet: In an impressive start to the Nascar playoffs, the five-time champion Jimmie Johnson won the pole for the Sprint Cup race at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, Ill.
abstract: Nascar driver Jimmie Johnson wins the pole for the 400-mile Sprint Cup race at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, Ill.
lead_paragraph: In an impressive start to the Nascar playoffs, the five-time champion Jimmie Johnson won the pole for the Sprint Cup race at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, Ill.
